Last item for navigation

Mayor's Office
--------------

![Mayor Kara King](https://cdnsm5-hosted.civiclive.com/UserFiles/Servers/Server_18411943/Image/Government/City%20Council/Kara4.jpg "Mayor Kara King")

May 2020: Elected as Mayor of Bee Cave
May 2013: Elected to Bee Cave City Council
August 2013: Appointed to Bee Cave Economic Development Board
2013 & 2014:
Emmaus Gala Chair- $200,000 fundraiser benefiting greater Lake Travis & Austin area
February 2013:
Appointed by the Mayor to serve on the committee to draft the Bee Cave Home Rule Charter
2011 - Present:
Founder and Executive Race Director: Stop The Clot Austin 5K
2011-2013:
National Board Member for the National Blood Clot Alliance
March '09-2013:
Established and elected Chair of Falconhead West Social Committee
2008-Present:
Bee Cave Elementary and Lake Travis M.S. PTO/PTA- multiple Executive Officer and committee positions

Mrs. King grew up in Texas and graduated from Texas A&M University in 1998 with a degree in Biomedical Science.

Mayor King believes in balancing growth with the needs and quality of life of our community, while being respectful of the community's heritage. Bee Cave is a one of a kind community and it's position as the "Gateway to the Hill Country" needs to be protected and nurtured. The Mayor and her husband, Ben, met at A&M and moved around the first 8 years of their marriage while he was a pilot in the Marine Corps. They have 3 children: Wes (22), Brannon (17) and Tierney (16), and taking an active role in shaping the community where they grow up is something she passionately believes in. She loves history, traveling, cooking, cheering on her kids in their activities and Aggie football!

**Contact:**
E-mail:
[Mayor Kara King](mailto:kking@beecavetexas.gov)

![Bee Cave, Texas Logo](/UserFiles/Servers/Server_18411943/Templates/img/footer-logo-2023.png)

Bee Cave City Hall 4000 Galleria

Phone (512) 767-6600
